wikipedia_page.main: Lady Clara Elizabeth Iris Paget (born 1988) is an English aristocrat, model, and actress known for her roles in films St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold and Fast & Furious 6, and her role as Anne Bonny in the television series Black Sails.

response: Clara Paget plays Lake in the 2021 movie The Lost Blonde.
Lady Clara Paget (born 1988), daughter of the eighth Marquess, is an actress and model well known for her role in the TV series Black Sails.
* Bonny is a main character in the Starz series Black Sails and is portrayed by Clara Paget
* Clara Paget (born 1988), British model and actress
* Anne Bonny (Clara Paget) in the pirate-themed TV series Black Sails.

Vegh is a female assassin in Shaw's team. She is his right-hand woman and one of the two drivers for the flip cars. She and Klaus both play an important role in kidnapping Mia. Vegh is killed by Brian by having her crash her car into an airline bumper. She is portrayed by Clara Paget.

link_mentions.page: St Trinian's 2: The Legend of Fritton's Gold

response: * Clara Paget (born 1988), British model and actress

In addition, John Ortiz briefly reprises his role as Arturo Braga and Shea Whigham also returning as FBI Agent Stasiak, both from Fast & Furious. Shaw's team members are played by Clara Paget as Vegh, Kim Kold as Klaus, Joe Taslim as Jah, David Ajala as Ivory, Thure Lindhardt as Firuz, and Benjamin Davies as Adolfson. Rita Ora has an uncredited cameo role as a race starter in London, and Jason Statham makes an uncredited cameo during the end credits as Deckard Shaw, Owen's older brother and the person responsible for Han's death, which the character was continued and featured in Furious 7.

response: |Anne Bonny || Clara Paget || Black Sails || Anne was lover and life-partner with fellow pirate Jack Rackham before she met Max, a prostitute in a Nassau brothel, and they became lovers.

As Earl of Uxbridge, he married Georgeanne Elizabeth Elliott Downes in 1986; they were divorced in 2011. Married Susan De Paolis, 13 June 2015, Mayfair. His daughter, Clara Paget is a model and actress.

* Clara Paget as Anne Bonny: Crew Mate of the Ranger and later of the Colonial Dawn.
